title: Louis Scarcella Defends His Work at Hearing on Conviction in ’91 Murder
text:
Louis Scarcella Defends His Work at Hearing on Conviction in ’91 Murder 
Published By: NYTimes - Yesterday 
The controversial retired police detective testified on Friday at a court hearing on whether John D. Bunn was wrongfully charged in the shoo...
